text: Wͻ’pε sε anka mopo (nokorε) no sεdeε wͻn apoͻ no, na moyε pε; enti monhwε yie na moanfa wͻn mu bi ayͻnkoͻ kosi sε wͻ’betu amantuo wͻ Nyankopͻn kwan so. Sε wͻ’dane wͻn akyi dema nokorε no a, εneε baabiara a mobenya wͻn no monkye wͻn na monku wͻn, na monhwε na moanfa wͻn mu bi adamfoͻ anaasε aboafoͻ
